model: CrossWave All-in-One Wet Dry Vac (1785 Series)
seo_keywords: Bissell CrossWave brush roll not turning

problems.title: Leaving Streaks / Not Cleaning Well
problems.description: The floor looks dirty or streaky after cleaning, or the machine leaves wet puddles.
solution_steps: Remove the brush roll and wash it. Let it dry completely.
Wipe the wheels with a paper towel.
Ensure you are using the correct Multi-Surface formula, not plain water or bleach.

required_parts.name: Replacement Brush Roll & Filter Bundle
required_parts.search_query: Bissell CrossWave 1785 Brush Roll Filter Kit

problems.title: Not Spraying Water / Solution
problems.description: Trigger is pressed but no solution comes out of the foot.
solution_steps: Remove and reseat the clean water tank. You should hear a click.
Check if the tank is full.
Clean the spray nozzle on the foot with a pin or warm water.
